extendedInfo.description: Locate the words in the grid of the list in the shortest time!Several dimensions of grids are available with 3 levels, providing you hours of play.The crossword are dynamically generated and the application is available in different languages.The word search (also called mixed words or word searches) is a classic game and you can now enjoy.Currently, 15 languages are supported!For adding new languages ââor request additional features, do not hesitate to contact us!
